Nerangs.ab: yaϑā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan pad š́iiaoθənanąm sāzišn ud zōhr hamāg xūb bē nigerišn
"He should recite four yaθā ahū vairiiō. At š́iiaoθənanąm, he has to inspect carefully all the implements and the zōhr."
yaϑā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan pad har š́iiaōϑənanąm rāspīg ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg bar ātaxš nihādan
"He should recite four yaθā ahū vairiiō At each š́iiaōϑənanąm, the rāspīg should put a piece of ēsm and bōy in the fire."

ModernPractice.ab: "After having recited the last Ahuna Vairiia, he recites daδat̰ vāstārəm three times. And while reciting that, the chief priest circles the bundle with both hands over the moon-shaped stands."
